## Description

Implement the main Dashboard view with real-time visualization components.

## Tasks

- [ ] Create a reusable `StatsCard.svelte` component.
- [ ] Implement visualization for:
  - CPU Usage
  - RAM Usage
  - Disk Space
  - Network Traffic
- [ ] Add Sparklines (using D3 or SVG) to the cards for trend visualization.
- [ ] Create a `NodeList` component with a table/grid view.
- [ ] Add status badges (Online, Offline, Syncing) to the Node List.

## Reference

- See `docs/agent-docs/ANALYSIS_UI_UX.md` Phase 2.
